-- table UsrPMCostReassignmentSource IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = N'dbo' AND TABLE_NAME = N'UsrPMCostReassignmentSource') BEGIN PRINT 'Create table UsrPMCostReassignmentSource' CREATE TABLE [dbo].UsrPMCostReassignmentSource( [CompanyID] [int] NOT NULL ,[PMReassignmentID] [char] (10) NOT NULL ,[LineID] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL ,[ProjectID] [int] NOT NULL ,[TaskID] [int] NULL ,[AccountGroupFrom] [int] NULL ,[AccountGroupTo] [int] NULL ,[NoteID] [uniqueidentifier] NULL ,[CreatedByID] [uniqueidentifier] NOT NULL ,[Tstamp] [timestamp] NULL ,[CreatedByScreenID] [char](8) NOT NULL ,[CreatedDateTime] [datetime] NOT NULL ,[LastModifiedByID] [uniqueidentifier] NOT NULL ,[LastModifiedDateTime] [datetime] NOT NULL ,[LastModifiedByScreenID] [char](8) NOT NULL CONSTRAINT [PK_UsrPMCostReassignmentSource] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [CompanyID] ASC, [PMReassignmentID] ASC, [LineID] ASC ) WITH ( PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON ))
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[UsrPMCostReassignmentSource] WITH NOCHECK ADD CONSTRAINT [FK_UsrPMCostReassignment_UsrPMCostReassignmentSource] FOREIGN KEY([CompanyID], [PMReassignmentID]) REFERENCES [dbo].[UsrPMCostReassignment] ([CompanyID], [PMReassignmentID])
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[UsrPMCostReassignmentSource] CHECK CONSTRAINT [FK_UsrPMCostReassignment_UsrPMCostReassignmentSource]
END
